text: Fifty Shades Freed wastes zero time â€” the final installment of the films based on E. L. James'( dominant ) boy meets ( virginal ) girl story dives right in to the nuptials of Christian Grey ( played by Jamie Dornan ) and Anastasia Steele ( Dakota Johnson ). When we meet Ana this time around, she's wearing her wedding dress : a lace - and - tulle confection that cascades to the ground in an elegant train. The woman responsible for the memorable dress is Monique Lhuillier, who also designed the silver slip dress Ana wore to the masquerade ball in the second film, Fifty Shades Darker.
